title: Nikolay Rumyantsev (athlete)
text: Nikolay Rumyantsev (born 31 May 1930) is a Soviet <a href="long-distance%20track%20event">long-distance runner</a>. He competed in the <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20marathon">marathon</a> at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
